meanings.sent1: The prespecified time for the meeting is 3 o'clock.
meanings.sent2: The prespecified rules must be followed at all times.
meanings.sent3: She always arrives at the prespecified time, never late.
meanings.sent4: The prespecified route led us straight to the destination.
meanings.sent5: The prespecified color of the dress was a vibrant red.

meanings.sent1: Please prespecified the details of the project before starting.
meanings.sent2: He prespecified the requirements for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The magician prespecified the card that would be chosen.
meanings.sent4: She prespecified the menu for the dinner party.
meanings.sent5: The teacher prespecified the topics for the upcoming test.
